title: Sheltering in Love – Part 7: Awakening from the Prison of Blame (2020-05-06)
itunes:title: Sheltering in Love – Part 7: Awakening from the Prison of Blame
description: Sheltering in Love – Part 7: Awakening from the Prison of Blame (2020-05-06) - A key way stress disconnects us from ourselves and each other is through the limbic reactivity of blame. This talk helps us to recognize the suffering of chronic blame, resentment and anger, and to bring a healing presence to the vulnerability that underlies blame.
